chapter.text: 44|1|Ha - mima.
44|2|Sapatha suspasta kitabera [1].
44|3|Niscaya amara eta nayila karechi eka mubaraka rate [1]; niscaya amara satarkakari.
44|4|Se rate pratyeka curanta sid'dhanta sthirakrta haya [1]
44|5|amadera paksa theke adesakrame, niscaya amara rasula preranakari
44|6|apanara rabera rahamatasbarupa; niscaya tini sarbasrota, sarbajna—
44|7|asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, yadi tomara niscita bisbasi ha'o.
44|8|Tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i, tini jibana dana karena ebam tini'i mrtyu ghatana; tini tomadera raba ebam tomadera pitrpurusadera'o raba.
44|9|Baram tara sandehera basabarti haye khela -- tamasa karache.
44|10|Ata'eba apani apeksa karuna se dinera yedina spasta dhomyaya acchanna habe akasa [1]
44|11|ta abrta kare phelabe lokaderake. Eta yantranadayaka sasti.
44|12|(Tara balabe) ‘he amadera raba! Amadera theke sasti dura karuna, niscaya amara mumina haba.’
44|13|Tara ki kare upadesa grahana karabe? Athaca itopurbe tadera kache eseche spasta eka rasula
44|14|tarapara tara tara theke mukha phiriye niyechila ebam balechila, ‘e eka siksaprapta pagala!’
44|15|Niscaya amara alpa samayera jan'ya sasti rahita karaba --- (kintu) niscaya tomara tomadera agera abasthaya phire yabe.
44|16|Yedina amara prabalabhabe pakara'o karaba, sedina niscaya amara haba pratisodha grahanakari.
44|17|Ara abasya'i edera age amara phira’a'una sampradayake pariksa karechilama ebam tadera kache'o esechilena eka sam'manita rasula [1]
44|18|(tini phira'a'unake balechilena) ‘allahara bandaderake amara kache phiriye da'o [1]. Niscaya ami tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula.
44|19|‘Ara tomara allahara birud'dhe aud'dhatya prakasa karo na, niscaya ami tomadera kache spasta pramana niye asaba.
44|20|‘Ara niscaya ami amara raba o tomadera rabera asraya prarthana karachi, yate tomara amake patharera aghata hanate na para [1].
44|21|‘Ara yadi tomara amara kathaya bisbasa sthapana na kara, tabe tomara amake chere ya'o.’
44|22|Atahpara musa tara rabake dakalena, ‘niscaya era eka aparadhi sampapradaya.’
44|23|(Allah balalena) ‘sutaram tumi amara bandaderake niye rate bera haye paruna, niscaya tomadera pascad'dhabana kara habe.’
44|24|Ara samudrake sthira thakate dina [1], niscaya tara habe eka dubanta bahini.
44|25|Tara pichane rekhe giyechila aneka udyana o prasrabana
44|26|sasyaksetra o suramya prasada
44|27|ara bilasa upakarana, tate tara ananda peta.
44|28|Erupa'i ghatechila ebam amara e sabakichura uttaradhikari karechilama bhinna [1] sampradayake.
44|29|Atahpara asamana ebam yamina tadera jan'ya asrupata kareni ebam tara abakasapraapta'o chila na.
44|30|Ara abasya'i amara ud'dhara karechilama bani isara'ilake lanchanadayaka sasti hate
44|31|phira’a'una theke; niscaya se chila simalanghanakaridera madhye sirsasthaniya.
44|32|Ara amara jene sune'i taderake sakala srstira upara nirbacita karechilama.
44|33|Ara amara taderake emana nidarsanabali diyechilama yate chila suspasta pariksa [1]
44|34|niscaya tara bale'i thake
44|35|‘amadera prathama mrtyu chara ara kichu'i ne'i ebam amara punarut'thita ha'oyara na'i.
44|36|Ata'eba, tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe amadera pitrpurusaderake niye asa.’
44|37|Tara ki srestha na tubba’ sampradaya [1] o tadera purbe yara chila tara? Amara taderake dhbansa karechilama. Niscaya tara chila aparadhi.
44|38|Ara amara asamanasamuha,yamina o e du’yera madhyakara kono kichu'i khelara chale srsti karini
44|39|amara e du'tike yathayathabhabe'i srsti karechi, kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na.
44|40|Niscaya phayasalara dinati tadera sabara jan'ya nirdharita samaya.
44|41|Sedina eka bandhu an'ya bandhura kono kaje asabe na ebam tara sahayya'o pabe na.
44|42|Tabe allaha yara prati daya karena tara katha sbatantra. Niscaya tini'i mahaparakramasali, parama dayalu.
44|43|Niscaya yakkuma gacha habe [1]
44|44|papira khadya
44|45|galita tamara mata, petera madhye phutate thakabe
44|46|phutanta pani phutara mata.
44|47|(Bala habe) take dhara ebam tene niye ya'o jahannamera madhyasthale
44|48|tarapara tara mathara upara phutanta panira sasti dhele da'o
44|49|(bala habe) ‘asbadana kara, niscaya tumi'i sam'manita, abhijata
44|50|‘niscaya eta ta-i, ye bisaye tomara sandeha karate.’
44|51|Niscaya muttakira thakabe nirapada sthane [1]—
44|52|udyana o jharnara majhe
44|53|tara parabe mihi o puru resami bastra ebam basabe mukhomukhi haye.
44|54|Erupa'i ghatabe; ara amara taderake biye diye deba dagara nayana huradera sathe
44|55|sekhane tara prasanta citte bibidha phalamula anate balabe.
44|56|Prathama mrtyura para tara sekhane ara mrtyu asbadana karabe na [1]. Ara tini taderake jahannamera sasti hate raksa karabena
44|57|apanara rabera anugrahasbarupa [1]. Eta'i to mahasaphalya.
44|58|Atahpara niscaya amara apanara bhasaya kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi, yate tara upadesa grahana kare.
44|59|Kaje'i apani pratiksa karuna, niscaya tara pratiksamana.
